definitions.definition: A cover or protection for an advanced trench or approach , formed of fascines and earth supported by a framework .
A deep dugout , often equipped with bunks and other fittings .
A final layer of material such as sand or road scrapings that is spread to fill in any small gaps in the road surface and soak up any wet spots.

main_definition: ( military , historical ) A cover or protection for an advanced trench or approach , formed of fascines and earth supported by a framework .
secondary_definitions: ( military ) A deep dugout , often equipped with bunks and other fittings .
A final layer of material such as sand or road scrapings that is spread to fill in any small gaps in the road surface and soak up any wet spots.
